ComicInfo.Summary:
Brand New Series! Jughead Jones is a werewolf, and Reggie Mantle has fallen victim to Jughead's monstrous ways. Now Betty Cooper: Werewolf Hunter along with Archie Andrews are hot on the trail of Jughead.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Francesco Francavilla | 1 | RE | Stadium Comics Exclusive Variant Cover | ? | 2 | B | Cover B | Robert Hack | 3 | C | Cover C | Michael Walsh | 4 | The Stadium Comics variant is an homage to Werewolf by Night #32.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:36:34. [CVDB632588]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Francesco Francavilla, Michael Walsh, Robert Hack
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Jughead Jones, Reggie Mantle
